About

Track Attack Running is a run coaching services company specializing in transformative speed workouts and run form analysis for runners and multi-sport athletes. Track Attack Running was founded in 2004 in Sacramento by Tony Pelosi and Chi-An Wang. As collegiate track captains who went on to become competitive amateur triathletes, they adapted lessons from masters swimming to turn monotonous track workouts into fun yet impactful group experiences that could be enjoyed by athletes of all levels. Their book, which builds on their experience operating successful running programs to build speed and achieve personal bests for 5ks to marathons, is coming soon.

Book: Coming Soon

We’re distilling two decades of group workout design into a practical playbook for building speed and enjoying the process—from 5Ks to marathons. Want first dibs when it drops? Leave a note in the contact form.
